
Bookmarks Menu extension provides favorite menu which you can add 
documents to open directly from the menu.

This extension also provides the following functions: 
* Execute general commands are the same with normal entries of the menu.
* Open a file with your favorite program, depends on your environment.
* Open... or Save As... with specific starting folder.
* Execute macros.
* Hierarchical menu which shows file system and allows to open one of it.
